description:
Wayra is a globally connected and technological open innovation hub in the world.  We currently operate in  10  countries: Argentina, Brazil, Chile, Colombia, Germany, Mexico, Peru, Spain, the United Kingdom, and Venezuela.

Through Telefónica our global presence allows us to be at the helm of innovation, shoulder to shoulder with driven entrepreneurs and in a position to engage the right partners and leaders of industries for business. Our mission is clear, to connect innovators with Telefónica and generate joint business opportunities. We are the interface between Telefónica and entrepreneurial ecosystems across the globe because innovation makes good business sense.
name: Wayra
short_description: Wayra connects Telefonica and technological disruptors around the world.

description:
VíaGalicia is an accelerator program for entrepreneurs and startups. It is an ecosystem for entrepreneurs and companies promoted by the Consortium of the Free Zone of Vigo and Xunta de Galicia. VíaGalicia provides seed capital, training, infrastructure, and intensive advice for entrepreneurs and companies. 

VíaGalicia was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Vigo, Pontevedra.

description:
Tecnalia Ventures is a venture builder belonging to the Tecnalia research and technological development center, the first national center and one of the most relevant in Europe. It performs a comprehensive management of the life cycle of technological assets, from their definition to their commercialization. Thus, it maximizes its value and then transfers them to the market through the creation of technology-based companies or the sale of industrial property and increase the return on investment made in R&D. In short, it transforms technology into GDP.

To do this, they look for technologically disruptive solutions that solve problems of the corporate income statement, accelerate them by deploying technological capabilities in them, expose them from early stages of development to investment criteria and focus efforts on initiatives with greater commercialization potential. It is about accelerating the incubation of business opportunities, turning innovative technologies into invertible businesses capable of generating value for society.

Since its creation in 2013, Tecnalia Ventures has established itself as a key tool for the valorization of R&D. As of December 31, 2016 they have promoted 22 active companies and have a portfolio of 13 investee companies, which accumulate 33.5 million euros of turnover and 267 jobs generated.

In addition, Tecnalia has multiplied by seven the revenues it had in the section on the sale of industrial property, consisting of royalty income, technology sales and revenues derived from the creation and exploitation of new technology-based companies. Also, in 2016, in addition to the 12 applications for software registrations, Tecnalia applied for 28 new patent families, of which they obtained 11. Thus, the VB already has a portfolio of 116 families with 391 patents and is sixth in the ranking of Spanish companies with more European patent applications.
name: Tecnalia Ventures
short_description: Tecnalia Ventures is a venture builder that belongs to the Tecnalia research and technological development center.

description: We aim to take minority stakes in European consumer facing startups that can shape the future of marketplaces. Our primary investment areas are proptech, fintech, future of work, education and mobility among others. We look for aspiring category leaders with tangible traction, a potential to scale beyond their domestic market, and which we can support with more than financial resources. Our sweet spot is Series A and B.
name: Adevinta Ventures
short_description: Adevinta Ventures is the VC arm of leading online marketplace player Adevinta

description:
Our mission is to design innovative businesses and build intelligent solutions and new brand services for Astara’s environment. As mobility specialists, we also invest in European and South American startups

We have developed our venture-building workflow, which combines best global practices with our experience as entrepreneurs (20+ years). Thanks to our extensive network, we help to forge partnerships and accelerate new business in all of the countries in which we operate.

We aim to create a mobility revolution that enables sustainability and incentivises companies to innovate.
name: ASTARA Innovation & Venture Lab (formerly B4Motion)
short_description: As mobility specialists, we also invest in European and South American startups and build intelligent solutions and new brand services

description:
VentureCap invests in the industrial, technology, commerce and distribution sectors.

In 2000, VenturCap was born, a venture capital fund that invests both in startups and in companies in the growth phase. It was founded by a group of entrepreneurs with the ambition of being able to transfer their experience to these companies and boost their growth.

 Headquartered in Barcelona, ​​VenturCap is consolidated as the option for companies to consolidate their viability and develop their business model, investing in any non-financial company that is not listed on the first stock market, which has a viable project. and that show possibilities of success.
name: VenturCap
short_description: VentureCap is a venture capital fund that caters to startups in their growth phase.

description:
On 18 June 1990, Catalan Parliament gave the go-ahead for the creation of a new public university in Catalonia, Pompeu Fabra University, inspired by the principles of freedom, democracy, justice, equality, independence and plurality. 

From its beginnings, this young academic institution set itself two main objectives: to train responsible professionals and citizens fully committed to civic values, and to contribute towards the development of an outstanding research.
name: Pompeu Fabra University
short_description: Pompeu Fabra University is a university in Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain.

description:
Tressis is a wealth management and financial service company that provides portfolio investment assistance to clients. The company also specializes in wealth management and independent financial planning through investment funds and financial products. It offers portfolio management, securities brokerage, banking, investment funds, pension plans, bonds, and related financial services.

Tressis received the ICADE ASSOCIATION 2010 Award for Excellent Business Project, 2015 DIRECTORS Award for Business Initiative, and 2015 ECONOMIC UPDATE Award for 100 Best Ideas: Socially Responsible Portfolios.

Tressis was established in 2000 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain	.
name: Tressis
short_description: Tressis is a wealth management and financial service company that provides portfolio investment assistance to clients.
